title: How to Play Block Story

steps.headline: Make a new world.
steps.description: Add the seed number. You can either leave the random one given or put in one of your own. Add the world name. You can either leave the 'My World 1' given or put in one of your own. Touch/click next.

steps.headline: Make a new character.
steps.description: Add the name. Touch/click next.

steps.headline: Go through the introduction and find Ted.
steps.description: It may take a while, so take it gradually and be patient. When you do find him, talk to him and take his quest.

steps.headline: Get wood.
steps.description:
Go to the nearest tree. Touch/click and hold on the trunk until a block falls
Walk over the block that fell to pick it up. Repeat as often as required.

steps.headline: Make planks.
steps.description: Put all of the wood you collected into the crafting grid in your inventory. Touch/click and hold onto the planks it will show under the crafting grid until there is nothing left.

steps.headline: Take out the crafting table you made during the introduction and place it.
Make some sticks.
steps.description: If you did the introduction correctly, you should know how to make them.

steps.headline: Get wax.
steps.description: Find an oak tree and see if it has wax on it. If it does, then collect the wax. If it doesn't, then find another oak tree.

steps.headline: Find some coal.
steps.description: Search a cave, look under a low floating island, look in a river, or look on a cliff.

steps.headline: Make fire.
steps.description: You can find the crafting recipe in the crafting book (located in the inventory!). It will be in the items section of the crafting book.

steps.headline: Make some candles.
steps.description: The candle recipe will be located under 'blocks' in the crafting book.

steps.headline: Place the candle and your crafting table where you want to stay for as long as you need.
Then, if it's night, just wait out the night.
steps.description: If it's not, then continue.

steps.headline: When the next day breaks, find a cave or cliff.
steps.description: If you chose a cliff, then get all the ore from it and start a little mine. If you chose a cave, then get some stone from it and start a little mine.

steps.headline: Go to your crafting table and make some swords (the sword recipe is located under 'weapons' in the crafting book.
Find a cave and search it for ores.
steps.description: Keep going until you run into a monster.

steps.headline: If you don't find any gold, then repeat until you have at least 16 gold ores.
Make some long swords.
steps.description: They will not be in your crafting book yet. You make them in the same way as stone swords except with gold instead of stone.

steps.headline: Go back to the first cave's monster and kill it.
steps.description: First destroy the spawner. Then attack it with your gold swords until it dies.

steps.headline: Keep mining, getting ores, and fighting monsters until you run out of long swords.
Go back home and do Ted's quest.
Get his next quest.
steps.description: You will have to get 10 gold ore and 20 gold ore to do this quest.

steps.headline: Do that quest.
steps.description: If you don't already have the gold and coal, then get it.

steps.headline: See Paula.
steps.description: Before you go to Paula. Make some flippers (the recipe is in the crafting book under 'armor') and do Ted's next 2 quests. Then, get your stuff and search for a spot with both Paula and Shadow hunter in the area. When you do find a spot then put down your stuff and get her first quest.

steps.headline: Do Paula's quests until you get to the one where you have to kill 20 Dyllin/werewolves.
Make a chest to hold some of your stuff.
steps.description: The recipe is found under tools in the crafting book.

steps.headline: Find some caves and fight through monsters and collect ore until you have:
steps.description: 50 blue ore; 25 ruby ore; 110 coal ore; And you're level 30 at least.

steps.headline: Get as much of your stuff as you can, head for a mountain for the werewolf quest.
steps.description: When you make it to the mountain, look for a spawner that's not spawning anything. Then set up a monster proof base near the spawner, but not close enough for the monster spawner to spawn something in your base.

steps.headline: Stay there for the night.
steps.description:
When nightfall comes, watch the spawner closely until something spawns. When it does spawn:
Grab some of your strongest weapons (such as hunting knifes, or gold swords). Kill it. Repeat until you have killed it 20 times.

steps.headline: Find Paula, to complete the quest.
steps.description: Now you're free to do all the quests you want, fight all the battles you want, and do whatever you want.

text:
Make a new world. Add the seed number. You can either leave the random one given or put in one of your own. Add the world name. You can either leave the 'My World 1' given or put in one of your own. Touch/click next. Make a new character. Add the name. Touch/click next. Go through the introduction and find Ted. It may take a while, so take it gradually and be patient. When you do find him, talk to him and take his quest. Get wood. Go to the nearest tree. Touch/click and hold on the trunk until a block falls
Walk over the block that fell to pick it up. Repeat as often as required. Make planks. Put all of the wood you collected into the crafting grid in your inventory. Touch/click and hold onto the planks it will show under the crafting grid until there is nothing left. Take out the crafting table you made during the introduction and place it.  Make some sticks. If you did the introduction correctly, you should know how to make them. Get wax. Find an oak tree and see if it has wax on it. If it does, then collect the wax. If it doesn't, then find another oak tree. Find some coal. Search a cave, look under a low floating island, look in a river, or look on a cliff. Make fire. You can find the crafting recipe in the crafting book (located in the inventory!). It will be in the items section of the crafting book. Make some candles. The candle recipe will be located under 'blocks' in the crafting book. Place the candle and your crafting table where you want to stay for as long as you need.  Then, if it's night, just wait out the night. If it's not, then continue. When the next day breaks, find a cave or cliff. If you chose a cliff, then get all the ore from it and start a little mine. If you chose a cave, then get some stone from it and start a little mine. Go to your crafting table and make some swords (the sword recipe is located under 'weapons' in the crafting book. ). Find a cave and search it for ores. Keep going until you run into a monster. If you don't find any gold, then repeat until you have at least 16 gold ores.  Make some long swords. They will not be in your crafting book yet. You make them in the same way as stone swords except with gold instead of stone. Go back to the first cave's monster and kill it. First destroy the spawner. Then attack it with your gold swords until it dies. Keep mining, getting ores, and fighting monsters until you run out of long swords.  Go back home and do Ted's quest.  Get his next quest. You will have to get 10 gold ore and 20 gold ore to do this quest. Do that quest. If you don't already have the gold and coal, then get it. See Paula. Before you go to Paula. Make some flippers (the recipe is in the crafting book under 'armor') and do Ted's next 2 quests. Then, get your stuff and search for a spot with both Paula and Shadow hunter in the area. When you do find a spot then put down your stuff and get her first quest. Do Paula's quests until you get to the one where you have to kill 20 Dyllin/werewolves.  Make a chest to hold some of your stuff. The recipe is found under tools in the crafting book. Find some caves and fight through monsters and collect ore until you have: 50 blue ore; 25 ruby ore; 110 coal ore; And you're level 30 at least. Get as much of your stuff as you can, head for a mountain for the werewolf quest. When you make it to the mountain, look for a spawner that's not spawning anything. Then set up a monster proof base near the spawner, but not close enough for the monster spawner to spawn something in your base. Stay there for the night. When nightfall comes, watch the spawner closely until something spawns. When it does spawn:
Grab some of your strongest weapons (such as hunting knifes, or gold swords). Kill it. Repeat until you have killed it 20 times. Find Paula, to complete the quest. Now you're free to do all the quests you want, fight all the battles you want, and do whatever you want.
